name: Spikes Color - Don't Touch The different Spikes
name_original: Spikes Color - Don't Touch The different Spikes
description:
SPIKE COLOR -- Once you start you can' stop!

The most addictive and unique 2D action and voice game!

Endless model:
1. SPIKE TOUCH--tap to control the knight jump to touch the same color spike.
2. SPIKE SCREAM--scream to control the knight jump to touch the same color spike.
3. EIGHTH HERO--sound control the hero jump and move as far as you can,avoid the obstacles.
4. LEFT RIGHT--be careful to use your left and right finger to tap,keep knight up.
5. HURDLE HERO--tap and scream to control the three hero jump.

Level model:
JUMPY GO 150 LEVELS
RUNNER GO 24 LEVELS
FLAPPY GO 50 LEVELS
EIGHTH GO 24 LEVELS

Have a good time!
